Sabine Durden, Angel Mom and co-founder of Advocates for Victims of Illegal Alien Crime (AVIAC), will discuss a report that the moderate/globalist faction of the White House is pushing President Trump toward an immigration “deal” that would reduce the president’s key campaign platform — a wall on the U.S.-Mexico border — to a “bargaining chip” for more amnesty.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart London Editor-in-Chief Raheem Kassam — the author of the new book No Go Zones: How Sharia Law Is Coming to a Neighborhood Near You — will continue our discussion of the Trump administration’s agenda.

Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy and retired Lt. General Jerry Boykin, currently executive vice president of the Family Research Council, will discuss President Trump’s Afghanistan policy.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
